thread.title: 30 Hidden Tips for Mastering iOS 10 - Slideshow from PCMag.com
thread.title_full: 30 Hidden Tips for Mastering iOS 10 - Slideshow from PCMag.com

author: Eric Griffith
title: 30 Hidden Tips for Mastering iOS 10 - Slideshow from PCMag.com
text:
30 Hidden Tips for Mastering iOS 10 30 Hidden Tips for Mastering iOS 10 Click To View Slideshow » Apple's iOS 10 has arrived. These tips will help you make the most of it. 
Every year about this time, there are a slew of new tips to share with Apple iOS users. That's because iOS 10 is here, and like iOS 9 and iOS 8 before it, the improvements and tricks in the operating system keep on multiplying. 
Apple's iOS 10 didn't have the smoothest of rollouts; there were some unique quirks . Not Samsung Galaxy Note 7 bad , but there were some bricked iPhones, or at the very least updates that malfunctioned and required iTunes to complete the update. In PC Labs, our analysts updated five iPhones to iOS 10 and it worked great—on four of them. At this point, you're probably in the clear, though, and iPhone power-users will want to know exactly what's in store. These tips cover the best new features that aren't always obvious when first using Apple's newest mobile OS. 
( As we mentioned, not every mobile OS rollout is smooth. For more on that, check out The Most Annoying Features in iOS 10 .)
